plot: This curious film shows weird scenes of bizarre native rituals. We witness Elephant and Gorilla hunting and dissection by pygmy warriors. Tribal clans who practice lip splitting, bug eating...
title: Wild Rapture
plot_es: This curious film shows weird scenes of bizarre native rituals. We witness Elephant and Gorilla hunting and dissection by pygmy warriors. Tribal clans who practice lip splitting, bug eating...
